event.title: re:publica 25: "Ada & Zangemann" reading and movie at the Kids & Baby Space in Berlin, Germany

body.p: As part of the re:publica 25 Kids and Teens sessions, Matthias Kirschner will read from his book Ada & Zangemann: A Tale of Software, Skateboards, and Raspberry Ice Cream in the Kids & Baby Space. Following the reading, there will be a screening of the short film based on the book.
re:publica 25 will take place from 26 to 28 May 2025 at STATION Berlin. This year’s theme, “Generation XYZ,” highlights the voices, visions, and values shaping our digital future.
